text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Over the past 10 days the death total has actually been under 2,000 for #Covid19. Comparing the deaths to Vietnam or flooding or terrorism is absurd. How many other causes kill thousands each day? Using the FBI to spy on a political campaign is awful and should be dealt with.
